sqlMap.select: SELECT tb_device.id,imei,tb_user.name AS studentName,tb_device.ctime, tb_student.phone,tb_student.address,tb_school.name AS schoolName FROM tb_device INNER JOIN tb_student ON tb_student.device_id = tb_device.id INNER JOIN tb_user ON tb_user.id = tb_student.id INNER JOIN tb_class ON tb_student.class_id = tb_class.id INNER JOIN tb_school ON tb_class.school_id = tb_school.id ORDER BY id
